flavor_text: Joltik that live in cities have learned a technique for sucking electricity from the outlets in houses.
They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokemon and absorb static electricity which they store in an electric pouch.
Since it can't generate its own electricity it sticks onto large-bodied Pokemon and absorbs static electricity.
